alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1016 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melville, or over Plainview, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brentwood, Commack, Huntington Station, Centereach, Deer Park, Plainview, Medford, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Syosset, Huntington, Stony Brook, Farmingdale, Port Jefferson and Northport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
